ygData.subject: Re: The Stalker Stalks
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine rolls avoiding the blast, he raises himself to his feat and stares at Deathscythe, Whats the matter, don t you have the skill to take me without

Lunarpine rolls avoiding the blast, he raises himself to his feat and 
stares at Deathscythe, "Whats the matter, don't you have the skill to 
take me without your weapon?" He'd played almost every card in the 
deck but he still had a couple jokers up his sleave, and in this game 
jokers are wild. "You've already hit me once, wouldn't it be more 
enjoyable up close?" c'mon, lets see your best."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe::
> 
> DeathScythe moves forward to where his scanners reported Lunarpine 
was, the 
> assassin keeping his gun ready. A few feet from Lunarpine, 
DeathScythe comes 
> to a stop, transferring his gun to his left hand and pulling out a 
dagger 
> with his right.
> 
> He fires the gun in Lunarpine's direction.
